data.text: @MarkKeng Hi, Marky. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the flight delay. You may approach our airport personnel for immediate assistance. Thank you.

@Caria_Metis We sincerely appreciate your effort in bringing this matter to our attention, @Caria_Metis .

We look forward to serving you once again in the future. Thank you for your patronage. (2/2)

@Caria_Metis Hi again, Caria. We fully understand your concern on our procedure of taking photos of passports of passengers with forward connections. We have immediately terminated this procedure and have finetuned the process for transit passengers. (1/2)
@sehuniebabo You're welcome, Kysha! Is there anything else we can assist you with?

urls.title: Restricted items
urls.description: For the safety and comfort of our passengers, Philippine Airlines prohibits the use of inflight travel accessories/ comfort devices/ travel gadgets including but not limited to the following: inflight beds, inflatable cubes, knee defenders which are either attached to aircraft seat, inserted between seats or blocks access to seat rows or aisles as these may: Note: To convert milliampere hour (mAh) to Wh, multiply mAh by volts and then divide by 1000 (Wh = (mAh × V) ÷ 1000). mAh and volts specifications

data.text:
@sehuniebabo Yes, Kysha. You may bring 2 powerbanks with 10,000MAH, and have them included on you carry-on baggage. Please do take note that the maximum limit for powerbanks is 20,000MAH.

To know more: https://t.co/fpFMvfz6Rp

@jarvinJade This is noted, @jarvinJade. We are truly sorry for any inconvenience caused. May we know if you approach our cabin crew for any assistance? May we also clarify if the flight date for PR1867 is for October 9?
@sehuniebabo Hi, Kysha. May we know the quantity you intend to bring?

data.text:
@ashveendae Hi, Rose. Our Mabuhay Miles team can best assist you on this. You can send a message through their Facebook: Mabuhay Miles or send them a tweet at @PALMabuhayMiles. 

Thank you.
@jarvinJade Hi, @jarvinJade. May you provide more details on your concern? We will do our best to help.
@drasands We've sent you a dm, Sandra. Kindly check.
@drasands Hi, Sandra! As long as they're totally unused and properly packed / sealed, it will be allowed. It would be best to have it declared with the check in agent for their final assessment.

@paolocelso Hi, Pao. We’re sorry if you experience some issues with our website. May we suggest to refresh, clear your browser's cache, use an incognito tab or try using a different device or browser? Thank you.
@Violet_123890 You're welcome, Violetlady! :)

@violetvoyager You may also opt to request for a group booking (9 passengers or more) through the link below to get discounted rates.

https://t.co/XyqXfcj29M

Thank you and we hope to see you on-board!

(2/2)

urls.title: Get your PAL Supersavers!
urls.description: Your location has been selected. Your location has been selected. Your location has been selected. Your location has been selected. Make opportunities fly when you book now with PAL Supersavers for as low as P498 one-way economy base fare to visit local destinations and more! Pro tip: Rebooking must be done 24 hours before flight. Terms and Conditions Apply What's PAL Supersavers? PAL Supersavers is PAL's constant affordable domestic fares offering for those looking to travel in style yet within budget

urls.title: Human Remains
urls.description: In some countries like USA, passengers may be required to have the ashes placed in a clear plastic bag (before placing in an Urn) so that the screening personnel will be able to examine this thru the x-ray machine. When transporting ashes out of the Philippines, secure a permit from the Bureau of Quarantine (at the South Harbor, Port Area in Manila; tel. no. 301-9104), prior to the date of departure. Advance arrangement must be made and shipper must provide the following documents: Quarantine Certificate/P

urls.title: One Health Pass
urls.description: In response to the IATF directive the One Health Pass is officially replaced with the electronic ARRIVAL CARD (eARRIVAL CARD). To avoid inconvenience upon arrival, ALL travelers are encouraged to fill out and REGISTER to the eARRIVAL CARD within 72 hours prior to departure from port of embarkation. Registration is FREE OF CHARGE and neither require nor collect any online payment. BEWARE of fake, fraudulent, or scam websites and entities who require payment from the travelers. Click HERE to learn the

data.text: You may also connect with us 24/7 via Facebook Messenger, Viber, Webchat, and WhatsApp! Check out https://t.co/fBRRVoAqx8 for more details.

Passengers from Metro Manila may reach us via the following:
Landline - (02) 8539-0000
PH mobile - (+63) 919-056-2255 https://t.co/4NCr4yYtUF

urls.title: Arriving in Philippines
urls.description: International passengers must follow the arrival procedures of their PH port of entry mandated by PAL and the Philippine Government. Unvaccinated, partially vaccinated, and passengers whose vaccination status cannot be verified shall be required to complete a facility-based quarantine at the first port of entry into the Philippines, regardless the onward domestic destination. Ensure to check your first PH arrival airport prior to booking the facility. Last updated: PH Local Time, June 15, 2022 Travel

data.text: @stellanghel Hi, Angel. Yes, the passenger without at least one (1) COVID-19 booster shot will be required to present a negative pre-departure COVID test. For more information, please click this link: https://t.co/2XgnK14l9p. Thank you.

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,
